Title: Follow Miral
Description:
Tomothy's lynx, Miral, has been bugging me. I don't know what she wants but it is unusual to see her without my brother. She's a great farm cat, but she's still a cat, so maybe she's just bored with Tomothy today? I don't know. Maybe Tomothy got into some sort of trouble.

Can you find out what is bothering her for me?
ObjectivesText: Discover what is bothering Miral Murder-Mittens.
CompletionText: <Miral looks at you as if expecting something. You are being judged.>
RewardText: <Miral lets out a pleased sound and purrs at you.>
